content.description: Sit start on the big obvious flake, moving slightly right in order to reach the ledge and top out.
content.location: On the Lucky Someone Boulder uphill from the trail. The boulder has a large obvious starting flake.

content.description: Climb up the left side of the overhang.
content.location: On the Hobo Boulder. Downhill from Something for Sofia facing south.

content.description: Great movement and holds! Deserves more traffic for being only 3 minutes around the corner from the Power Roof.Sit start low on the obvious juggy rail, work up as the moves toughen, and manage a cool crescent like pinch along with the last and worst pocket. Rest on ear-like jugs after a big move, and finish up easy after a slightly insecure lockoff. Checking out the top beforehand might be wise as it's on the edge of a highball.
content.protection: 2-3 pads would suffice as landing is quite flat. Tree is less problematic than you anticipate.
content.location: Follow the trail around the corner from Power Roof as you make your way into the Land Beyond. The boulder will be on the left side of the trail with the obvious pocketed orange and black face just left of the tree.

content.description: Sit start on the far right side of the boulder and move left on the arete, then top out on the center of the boulder, same as Survival Instincts.
content.location: On the Lucky Someone Boulder uphill from the trail. The boulder has a large obvious starting flake.

content.description: Starting at the same location as Dirty Hobo Beard, but moving right.
content.location: On the Hobo Boulder. Northeast corner.

content.description: Sit start the same as I Sleep In My Jeep, but moving left.
content.location: On the Hobo Boulder. Northeast corner.

content.description: Sit start on the big flake moving up and to the left with small holds topping out in the center.
content.location: On the Lucky Someone Boulder uphill from the trail. The boulder has a large obvious starting flake.

content.description: Climb the right side of the overhang.
content.location: On the Hobo Boulder. Downhill from Something for Sofia facing south.

content.description: Generally eastward facing, good morning and afternoon sun. Less crowded than the North 40, and is an easy 5 minute walk from there.
